title: WRS christmas Weather Report Screensaver [full version]
description:
ABOUT THIS SCREENSAVER:

A screensaver that provides you with the information about
weather in the world. Christmas Weather Report Screensaver is
the Christmas Edition of popular Weather Screensaver!

Weather Report Screensaver is a screensaver that displays the
information about weather in the world and gives the weather
forecast for the nearest days.

Due to modern technologies Weather Report Screensaver will
quickly collect the information on weather in the world and/or
in your city from the best meteorological services of the world.
You don&#039;t need anymore the release of weather forecast on the TV.

You don&#039;t need to spend your time in Internet in searches of
qualitative weather forecast. Weather Report Screensaver will
make it for you.

Here are some key features of "Christmas Weather Report
Screensaver":

Ã‚Â· The current weather in the main cities of the world, on
different continents. Ã‚Â· The current weather in your city. Ã‚Â·
Weather forecast the nearest days for your city and other cities
of the world. Ã‚Â· The pleasant graphic interface with animation. Ã‚Â·
Constant access to the weather information. Ã‚Â· Weather Report
Screensaver use only reliable sources of the weather
information. Ã‚Â· Advanced settings. Ã‚Â· Thanking Weather Report
Screensaver you considerably reduce the traffic and time in the
Internet to reception of the weather information. Ã‚Â· Different
color themes. Ã‚Â· Animated icons of weather.
